Class SpriteSheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.graphics.SpriteSheet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource, Cloneable

    public class SpriteSheet
extends Object
implements Resource
    A class for sprite sheets.
    Author:
    wessles, opiop65, Jeviny

    • Method Summary

      void clean()
      A method for releasing anything that needs to be released, for it is the end!

      static SpriteSheet loadSpriteSheet(Texture baseTexture, int divSize)
      Slices the Texture baseTexture up, cutting horizontally and vertically every divSize length.
      static SpriteSheet loadSpriteSheet(Texture baseTexture, int divWidth, int divHeight)
      Slices the Texture baseTexture up, cutting vertically every divWidth length, and cutting horizontally every divHeight length.
      static SpriteSheet loadSpriteSheet(Texture baseTexture, SubTexture... subTextures)

    • Method Detail

      • loadSpriteSheet

        public static SpriteSheet loadSpriteSheet(Texture baseTexture,
                          int divSize)
        Slices the Texture baseTexture up, cutting horizontally and vertically every divSize length.

      • loadSpriteSheet

        public static SpriteSheet loadSpriteSheet(Texture baseTexture,
                          int divWidth,
                          int divHeight)
        Slices the Texture baseTexture up, cutting vertically every divWidth length, and cutting horizontally every divHeight length. The sub-textures are counted reading left to right.

      • loadSpriteSheet

        public static SpriteSheet loadSpriteSheet(Texture baseTexture,
                          SubTexture... subTextures)
        Returns:
        a sprite-sheet based off of Texture baseTexture, with SubTextures subTextures.

      • getNumberOfSubTextures

        public int getNumberOfSubTextures()
        Returns:
        the number of sub textures.

      • getTexture

        public SubTexture getTexture(int numTextures)
        Returns:
        the texture corresponding to the texture number.

      • getTextures

        public SubTexture[] getTextures()
        Returns:
        the textures.

      • getBaseTexture

        public Texture getBaseTexture()
        Returns:
        the base texture for all SubTextures.
